Name: Icemaze Cave: Skate Escape
About the game: Skate through the icy and labyrinthine depths of Icemaze Cave. Can you find your way out? Icemaze Cave: Skate Escape is a 2D logic puzzle game about path planning with exploration and collection elements, inspired by familiar retro adventure games. Explore the increasingly complex cave rooms. Find your way across the icy floors to the exit. Along the way, you may find valuable minerals worthy of a detour. Or perhaps you'd rather avoid detours altogether, using your expert navigational skills to stay on the shortest path out. Features Explore 100 levels of increasing difficulty, each with a different cave layout and a puzzle for you to solve. Collect valuable minerals along the way by solving the 100 complementary puzzles. Push your navigational skills to the limit to find the most efficient solutions for additional rewards. Stimulate your mental acuity by exercising spatial memorization and path planning. Enjoy the nostalgic style reminiscent of familiar retro adventure games. Social Join us on our community Discord server!
